Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The operation associated with log record.
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The category of the log.
Columns.Name: Category

Columns.Description: The correlationId for the log record.
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: The log type info level of the record.
Columns.Name: Level

Columns.Description: The location of the resource in the cloud where this log is originated.
Columns.Name: Location

Columns.Description: The associated tags of the log record.
Columns.Name: Tags

Columns.Description: The Status of the sql requests.
Columns.Name: Status

Columns.Description: The user properties of the log record.
Columns.Name: UserProperties

Columns.Description: The annotation details of the log record.
Columns.Name: Annotations

Columns.Description: The start time (UTC) of the activity run.
Columns.Name: Start

Columns.Description: The end time (UTC) for the activity run.
Columns.Name: End

Columns.Description: The name of the activity run.
Columns.Name: ActivityName

Columns.Description: The run id of the activity run.
Columns.Name: ActivityRunId

Columns.Description: The pipeline runId of the activity flow.
Columns.Name: PipelineRunId

Columns.Description: The effective integration runtime the activity run job.
Columns.Name: EffectiveIntegrationRuntime

Columns.Description: The type of the activity run.
Columns.Name: ActivityType

Columns.Description: The pipeline name of the activity flow.
Columns.Name: PipelineName

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
